targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "inv_slots_free")
  |> group(columns: ["character"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "character"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "state_bank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bank_slots_free")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kill")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["npc_type"] == "crab" or 
      r["npc_type"] == "phoenix" or 
      r["npc_type"] == "squig" or 
      r["npc_type"] == "mvampire" or 
      r["npc_type"] == "rgoo" or
      r["npc_type"] == "bgoo" or 
      r["npc_type"] == "goldenbat")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "npc_type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 1 }))
  |> group(columns: ["npc_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: count)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tick_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avg")
  |> group(columns: ["character", "_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "character"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 1000.0 / r._value }))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "health_percent")
  |> group(columns: ["character"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mana_percent")
  |> group(columns: ["character"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kill")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "npc_type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 1 }))
  |> group(columns: ["npc_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: count)

from(bucket:"telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and (r._field == "usage_system" or r._field == "usage_user") and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max)

from(bucket:"telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mem" and (r._field == "active" or r._field == "available"))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max)

from(bucket:"telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "disk" and (r._field == "used" or r._field == "free") and r.device == "md3")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tick_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "min" or r["_field"] == "avg" or r["_field"] == "max")
  |> group(columns: ["character", "_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "character", "_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "xp")
  |> group(columns: ["character"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean)
  |> difference()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["character"] == "Arcanomato")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r.map }))
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "map")
  |> group(columns: ["map"])
  |> count()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "damage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["character"] == "Arcanomato")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] != "burn")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: count, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kill")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "luck_chance")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "npc_type"])
  |> group(columns: ["npc_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["character"] == "Arrowmato")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r.map }))
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "map")
  |> group(columns: ["map"])
  |> count()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "damage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["character"] == "Arrowmato")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] != "burn")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: count, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kill")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "npc_type"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 1 }))
  |> group(columns: ["npc_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(value: 0)
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> sort(desc: true)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kill")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "luck_chance")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "npc_type"])
  |> group(columns: ["npc_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ping")
  |> group(columns: ["character"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "character"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["character"] == "Ragemato")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r.map }))
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "map")
  |> group(columns: ["map"])
  |> count()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "damage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["character"] == "Ragemato")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] != "burn")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: count, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "incoming")
  |> group(columns: ["event"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "outgoing")
  |> group(columns: ["event"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["character"] == "Seamato")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r.map }))
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "map")
  |> group(columns: ["map"])
  |> count()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "damage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["character"] == "Seamato")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] != "burn")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: count, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cc")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "character"])
  |> group(columns: ["character"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: max)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "damage")
  |> group(columns: ["character"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(value: 0.0)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "damage")
  |> group(columns: ["character"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(value: 0.0)
  |> mean()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "character"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Avg DPS"})

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "damage")
  |> group(columns: ["character"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(value: 0.0)
  |> max()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "character"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Max DPS"})
